attributes.action: Giving the general public the option to vote NO CONFIDENCE IN ALL OF THE ABOVE in UK Local and General Elections.
attributes.additional_details: I would like to propose that the electorate are allowed the option to vote NO CONFIDENCE IN ALL THE ABOVE in UK Local and General Elections. This would allow individuals to voice a valid opinion which at present is not heard. The result giving a clear and accurate account of just how many people an elected representative truly represents. If this was allowed it would then open up a debate postulating how the voice of a possible majority could be represented in this UK democracy.
